thread.section_title: WTSmedia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WTSmedia | www.wtsmedia.com | 2 of 6
thread.title: E. Goins

author: E. Goins
title: E. Goins
text:
I have had nothing but great service from WTS, namely, Larry Russell. Affectionately, "Mr. Larry" to me. The products that we get from you guys (CD's, labels, and our Custom Welcome CD that we distribute to all our First Time Guest) are of great quality. I will say this is one company where Customer Service still exits. I would highly recommend this company to anyone!
~E. Goins~
